text:
[Verse]
Running down the alley
Feet go splash splash splash
Smiles all around me
Life moves so fast

[Verse 2]
Underneath the streetlights
Glow so bright so bright
Laughing through the night time
Hearts feeling light

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain yeah
Spinning round and round
Feeling every raindrop
Never coming down

[Verse 3]
Puddles forming rivers
Jumping high so high
Echoes through the city
Reaching for the sky

[Bridge]
No plans we're just flowing
Water never slows
In this rainy moment
Anything goes

[Verse 4]
Friends are all together
Bound by light and dark
Stormy weather never
Stops a happy heart
title: Dancing in the Rain
